deck.name: Chandra, Fire Artisan
deck.oracle_text:
Whenever one or more loyalty counters are removed from Chandra, Fire Artisan, she deals that much damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
+1: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.
−7: Exile the top seven cards of your library. You may play them this turn.

deck.name: Liliana, Death's Majesty
deck.oracle_text:
+1: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.
−3: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.
−7: Destroy all non-Zombie creatures.

deck.name: Liliana, Death Wielder
deck.oracle_text:
+2: Put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature.
−3: Destroy target creature with a -1/-1 counter on it.
−10: Return all creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

deck.name: Liliana, Dreadhorde General
deck.oracle_text:
Whenever a creature you control dies, draw a card.
+1: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
−4: Each player sacrifices two creatures.
−9: Each opponent chooses a permanent they control of each permanent type and sacrifices the rest.

deck.name: Beloved Chaplain
deck.flavor_text: Nomad and Nantuko, eagle and elephant; all the birds and beasts are charmed by his quiet dignity.

deck.name: Beloved Princess
deck.oracle_text:
Lifelink
Beloved Princess can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.
deck.flavor_text: Sometimes a gentle slipper can travel where an armored boot's been denied.

deck.name: Ajani, Adversary of Tyrants
deck.oracle_text:
+1: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
−2: Return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
−7: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your end step, create three 1/1 white Cat creature tokens with lifelink."

deck.name: Ajani, Caller of the Pride
deck.oracle_text:
+1: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.
−3: Target creature gains flying and double strike until end of turn.
−8: Create X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens, where X is your life total.

deck.name: Nicol Bolas, Dragon-God
deck.oracle_text:
Nicol Bolas, Dragon-God has all loyalty abilities of all other planeswalkers on the battlefield.
+1: You draw a card. Each opponent exiles a card from their hand or a permanent they control.
−3: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
−8: Each opponent who doesn't control a legendary creature or planeswalker loses the game.

deck.name: Nicol Bolas
deck.oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Nicol Bolas unless you pay {U}{B}{R}.
Whenever Nicol Bolas deals damage to an opponent, that player discards their hand.

deck.name: Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh
deck.oracle_text:
+2: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a nonland card. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost.
+1: Each opponent exiles two cards from their hand.
−4: Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh deals 7 damage to target opponent, creature an opponent controls, or planeswalker an opponent controls.
−12: Exile each nonland permanent your opponents control.

deck.name: Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker
deck.oracle_text:
+3: Destroy target noncreature permanent.
−2: Gain control of target creature.
−9: Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker deals 7 damage to target player or planeswalker. That player or that planeswalker's controller discards seven cards, then sacrifices seven permanents.

deck.name: Nicol Bolas, the Deceiver
deck.oracle_text:
+3: Each opponent loses 3 life unless that player sacrifices a nonland permanent or discards a card.
−3: Destroy target creature. Draw a card.
−11: Nicol Bolas, the Deceiver deals 7 damage to each opponent. You draw seven cards.

deck.name: Nicol Bolas, the Ravager // Nicol Bolas, the Arisen
deck.type_line: Legendary Creature — Elder Dragon // Legendary Planeswalker — Bolas

card_faces.name: Nicol Bolas, the Ravager
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying
When Nicol Bolas, the Ravager enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
{4}{U}{B}{R}: Exile Nicol Bolas, the Ravager, then return him to the battlefield transformed under his owner's control. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card_faces.name: Nicol Bolas, the Arisen
card_faces.oracle_text:
+2: Draw two cards.
−3: Nicol Bolas, the Arisen deals 10 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
−4: Put target creature or planeswalker card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
−12: Exile all but the bottom card of target player's library.

deck.name: Blasted Landscape
deck.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

deck.name: Abuna's Chant
deck.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• You gain 5 life.
• Prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
Entwine {2} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

deck.name: Chandra Ablaze
deck.oracle_text:
+1: Discard a card. If a red card is discarded this way, Chandra Ablaze deals 4 damage to any target.
−2: Each player discards their hand, then draws three cards.
−7: Cast any number of red instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard without paying their mana costs.

deck.name: Cardboard Carapace
deck.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
For each other card named Cardboard Carapace you have with you outside the game, enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
